title: (x) Loup Charmant logo delicate script - Young Baroque {Marcelo}
content:
Hey,

I was wondering if anyone could help ID this cursive font...

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409022004im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/lc_logo,organicctn_5938.jpg)

 [‹ Pillgun simple sans caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409022004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40896 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Black italic sans in U.S. Honda Fit car commercials - Prosper {Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409022004/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40897 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rockstarchitect

comments.content: [Young Baroque](http://web.archive.org/web/20080409022004/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/itc/young_baroque/?sample_text=loup%20charmant&sample_size=60&acs_p=1&acs_pt=48&acs=1) by Doyald Young. See the character set for the alternates.
